resources.string: How does MegaAmp! work?\n\n• By detecting your device\'s vibration state, we can proxy a local alert to you anytime an open application sends a notification. This notification naturally pushes to your Android Wear device, if paired, giving you a nice, aggressive alert.

1) Long press your home screen and install the MegaAmp! widget.

2) Go into the settings of your favorite apps and enable “Vibration,” if applicable (most apps will auto-enable this).

3) Tap the MegaAmp! widget to enable aggressive notifications anytime you'd like!
